Master Sword.Name: Master Sword
Master Sword.Caption:
The legendary sword that seals the darkness.
Its corruption was healed by its time with the
Light Dragon. The blade gleams with a sacred
luster that can oppose the Demon King.
Master Sword.Caption (Japanese):
白龍から引き抜かれた 伝説の退魔の剣
悠久の時を経て 深い傷を癒し
魔王に対抗しうる新たな力を宿した

Tree Branch.Name: Tree Branch
Tree Branch.Caption:
Wooden branches such as this are pretty
common, but it's surprisingly well-balanced.
It doesn't do much damage but can serve
as a weapon in a pinch.
Tree Branch.Caption (Japanese):
どこにでも 落ちている木の枝で
振り回すのには ちょうど良いバランス
装備すれば 心もとないが武器として使える

Torch.Name: Torch
Torch.Caption:
This torch will stay lit once ignited, but if you
put it away, the flame will be extinguished
until you light it again.
Torch.Caption (Japanese):
火をつけると燃え続けるたいまつ
しまうと 火が消えるので
もう一度つける必要がある

Soup Ladle.Name: Soup Ladle
Soup Ladle.Caption:
A kitchen implement often used for serving
delicious soups. It was carved from the wood
of a sturdy tree, so it actually packs quite
the wallop.
Soup Ladle.Caption (Japanese):
スープをすくったり 炒め物で使われる料理道具
硬い木を削りだして作られているので
これで叩かれると結構痛い

Boomerang.Name: Boomerang
Boomerang.Caption:
A decayed wooden boomerang. A useful tool
that comes back after you throw it. Its current
state has not lessened its performance.
Boomerang.Caption (Japanese):
朽ちてしまった木製ブーメラン
投げても手元に戻ってくる 便利な武具で
朽ちていても その特性に変わりはない

Boomerang\u2728.Name: Boomerang✨
Boomerang\u2728.Caption:
This throwing weapon was originally used by
the forest-dwelling Koroks. Its unique shape
allows it to return after being thrown.
Boomerang\u2728.Caption (Japanese):
元々は森の民コログの武器
独特な形状は 投げても手元に戻ってくるよう
計算されて作られている

Sea-Breeze Boomerang.Name: Sea-Breeze Boomerang
Sea-Breeze Boomerang.Caption:
A boomerang said to have been used by a
hero who traveled the Great Sea. It smells
faintly of salt water.
Sea-Breeze Boomerang.Caption (Japanese):
大海原を旅した勇者が
愛用したといわれている ブーメラン
ほんのりと潮のかおりがする

Traveler's Sword.Name: Traveler's Sword
Traveler's Sword.Caption:
An average sword used largely by travelers.
The blade has decayed, but it can still serve
its purpose.
Traveler's Sword.Caption (Japanese):
旅人に広く普及していた一般的な剣
刀身部分が朽ちてしまっているが
一応 斬る目的に使う事ができる

Traveler's Sword\u2728.Name: Traveler's Sword✨
Traveler's Sword\u2728.Caption:
A very common sword often kept by travelers
to fend off small beasts. It's fairly durable
but a bit unreliable against monsters.
Traveler's Sword\u2728.Caption (Japanese):
主に危険な野生動物に対する備えとして
ハイラル全土で使われていた剣
壊れにくいが魔物相手には少し心もとない

Soldier's Broadsword.Name: Soldier's Broadsword
Soldier's Broadsword.Caption:
A light, thin metal sword used by the guards
of Hyrule Castle. Its light weight makes it
easy to handle and enables quicker charged
attacks.
Soldier's Broadsword.Caption (Japanese):
城の兵士が使っていた薄く軽い金属製の剣
軽くて扱いやすいため
タメ攻撃を素早く繰り出せる

Soldier's Broadsword\u2728.Name: Soldier's Broadsword✨
Soldier's Broadsword\u2728.Caption:
A sword brandished by soldiers who once
protected Hyrule Castle. Its blade is well
tuned for slaying monsters as it enables
quicker charged attacks.
Soldier's Broadsword\u2728.Caption (Japanese):
かつてハイラル城を守る兵士が使っていた剣
魔物と渡り合う事ができる斬れ味を持ち
タメ攻撃を素早く繰り出す事ができる

Knight's Broadsword.Name: Knight's Broadsword
Knight's Broadsword.Caption:
Knights of Hyrule once carried this sword.
Even in its decayed state, it shows its true
resolve in desperation and can yield powerful
attacks when you're down to your last heart.
Knight's Broadsword.Property 1: x2 Attack Power While Low Health
Knight's Broadsword.Caption (Japanese):
城を守る騎士が装備していた剣 ピンチの時に
真価を発揮し ハートの残りが1個以下の時
強力な攻撃を繰り出せる

Knight's Broadsword\u2728.Name: Knight's Broadsword✨
Knight's Broadsword\u2728.Caption:
Knights of Hyrule Castle once carried this
sword. It can yield powerful attacks when
you're down to your last heart.
Knight's Broadsword\u2728.Property 1: x2 Attack Power While Low Health
Knight's Broadsword\u2728.Caption (Japanese):
ハイラル城の騎士たちが携えていた剣
ハートの残りが1個まで減ると 
強力な攻撃を繰り出す事ができる

Royal Broadsword.Name: Royal Broadsword
Royal Broadsword.Caption:
A sword gifted to accomplished knights by the
royal family. Crafted for sword masters, it
increases the power of flurry rush during
perfect dodge.
Royal Broadsword.Property 1: x2 Attack Power During Flurry Rush
Royal Broadsword.Caption (Japanese):
王家が特別な功績をあげた騎士に与えた剣
剣術に長けた者の為に鍛えられ 回避ジャスト時の
ラッシュ攻撃が強力になる 特性を持つ

Royal Broadsword\u2728.Name: Royal Broadsword✨
Royal Broadsword\u2728.Caption:
The Hyrulean royal family would award this
sword to knights who achieved remarkable
feats. It increases the power of flurry rush
during a perfect dodge.
Royal Broadsword\u2728.Property 1: x2 Attack Power During Flurry Rush
Royal Broadsword\u2728.Caption (Japanese):
目覚ましい功績をあげた騎士に対して
ハイラル王家から与えられた剣 回避ジャスト時の
ラッシュ攻撃が強力になる 特性を持つ

Forest Dweller's Sword.Name: Forest Dweller's Sword
Forest Dweller's Sword.Caption:
A living, wooden Korok sword with a decayed
blade. Bursting materials attached to the tip
can be reused again and again.
Forest Dweller's Sword.Caption (Japanese):
刀身が朽ちてしまった コログ族の木製の剣
剣自体が生命力を宿しており 剣先に破裂する実を
付けると その特性を繰り返し利用できる

Forest Dweller's Sword\u2728.Name: Forest Dweller's Sword✨
Forest Dweller's Sword\u2728.Caption:
Koroks crafted this wooden sword for Hylians.
It might not be the best choice for head-on
attacks, but bursting materials attached to the
tip can be reused again and again.
Forest Dweller's Sword\u2728.Caption (Japanese):
コログ族が人間のために作ったといわれる
主に護身用として使われる剣 破裂する実を
剣先に付けると その特性を何度も利用できる

Zora Sword.Name: Zora Sword
Zora Sword.Caption:
A long Zora sword with a decaying blade.
Made of a metal favored by the Zora, it
yields a high attack power when it gets wet.
Zora Sword.Caption (Japanese):
刀身が朽ちてしまったゾーラ族の細身の剣
ゾーラ族と相性の良い金属を鍛えたもので
水に濡れると高い攻撃力を発揮する

Zora Sword\u2728.Name: Zora Sword✨
Zora Sword\u2728.Caption:
A unique sword with a thin blade of Zora
design that yields high attack power when
wet. This blade takes to water like a Zora.
Zora Sword\u2728.Caption (Japanese):
細い刀身とゾーラ族特有の装飾が特徴的な剣
水に濡れると高い攻撃力を発揮する 特性を持ち
水を得たゾーラの如き剣 とも呼ばれていた

Feathered Edge.Name: Feathered Edge
Feathered Edge.Caption:
A double-edged Rito sword with a decayed
blade. Swinging it produces a strong wind.
Feathered Edge.Caption (Japanese):
刀身が朽ちてしまったリト族の両刃の剣
独特な形状の刃は 振るたびに 
大きな風を巻き起こす事ができる

Feathered Edge\u2728.Name: Feathered Edge✨
Feathered Edge\u2728.Caption:
Rito craftsmen forged this lightweight, double-
edged sword so Rito warriors could maneuver
quickly in midair. Swinging it produces a
strong wind.
Feathered Edge\u2728.Caption (Japanese):
リト族が使う両刃の剣 空中でも素早い動きが
できるように工夫されており 振る事で
大きな風を巻き起こす 特性を持つ

Gerudo Scimitar.Name: Gerudo Scimitar
Gerudo Scimitar.Caption:
A decaying scimitar from the Gerudo region, it
is designed for maximizing force. Attaching a
material greatly enhances the material's
power but doesn't add as much durability.
Gerudo Scimitar.Caption (Japanese):
刀身が朽ちてしまったゲルド地方のナイフ 先端に
力が集中しやすく 剣に大きな負荷を与える代わり
切先の素材の力を限界まで引き出す 特性を持つ

Gerudo Scimitar\u2728.Name: Gerudo Scimitar✨
Gerudo Scimitar\u2728.Caption:
The most commonly used sword in the
Gerudo region. Attaching a material greatly
enhances the material's power but doesn't
add as much durability.
Gerudo Scimitar\u2728.Caption (Japanese):
ゲルド地方で使われていた最も一般的な剣
素材を付けると 剣に大きな負荷を与える代わり
その力を限界まで引き出す 特性を持つ

Scimitar of the Seven.Name: Scimitar of the Seven
Scimitar of the Seven.Caption:
A famous sword once beloved by the Gerudo
Champion Urbosa. It is said that when
Urbosa swung this sword in battle, her
movements resembled a beautiful dance.
Scimitar of the Seven.Caption (Japanese):
英傑ウルボザが愛用していた屈指の名剣
ウルボザがこの剣を振るう姿は
華麗な踊りのようだったと伝えられている

Eightfold Blade.Name: Eightfold Blade
Eightfold Blade.Caption:
A single-edged sword of the Sheikah tribe. 
Its small blade, now decayed, is suited for
covert actions and yields more powerful
sneakstrikes than ordinary blades.
Eightfold Blade.Caption (Japanese):
刀身が朽ちてしまったシーカー族の片刃の剣
小さな刀身は隠密行動に適しており
普通より ふいうちの威力が高い

Eightfold Blade\u2728.Name: Eightfold Blade✨
Eightfold Blade\u2728.Caption:
A single-edged sword traditional to the
Sheikah tribe. It just may be among the
sharpest conventional weapons ever made.
It can yield more powerful sneakstrikes.
Eightfold Blade\u2728.Caption (Japanese):
シーカー族の伝統的な片刃の剣
他に類をみない細身の刀身と 切れ味を持っており
普通より ふいうちの威力が高くなる 特性を持つ

Rusty Broadsword.Name: Rusty Broadsword
Rusty Broadsword.Caption:
This once-fearsome sword has seen better
days. It can do some damage in the right
hands but also breaks quickly.
Rusty Broadsword.Caption (Japanese):
はるかな昔 名のある剣士が使っていたであろう
錆び付いた片手剣
一応使えるが すぐに壊れてしまう

Sword of the Hero.Name: Sword of the Hero
Sword of the Hero.Caption:
A sword once wielded by a hero in an ancient
age. When it's grasped, a strange sense of
nostalgia washes over you. Take it when
going alone would otherwise be dangerous.
Sword of the Hero.Caption (Japanese):
古の時代の勇者が使っていたとされる剣
手にすると不思議と懐かしい気持ちになる

Royal Guard's Sword.Name: Royal Guard's Sword
Royal Guard's Sword.Caption:
A prototypical sword for knights. Its metal
may not be as durable as others, but the
sword yields massive destructive power just
before it breaks.
Royal Guard's Sword.Property 1: x2 Attack Power While Low Durability
Royal Guard's Sword.Caption (Japanese):
近衛騎士の装備として試作された剣 耐久力に
難がある特殊な金属を用いているが
壊れそうになると大きな攻撃力を発揮する

Royal Guard's Sword\u2728.Name: Royal Guard's Sword✨
Royal Guard's Sword\u2728.Caption:
A weapon made by the Sheikah using ancient
technology. Its low durability is a downside,
but it yields massive destructive power just
before it breaks.
Royal Guard's Sword\u2728.Property 1: x2 Attack Power While Low Durability
Royal Guard's Sword\u2728.Caption (Japanese):
古代の技術を使い シーカー族が造った武器
耐久性に問題があるが 壊れそうになると
大きな攻撃力を発揮する 特性を持つ

White Sword of the Sky.Name: White Sword of the Sky
White Sword of the Sky.Caption:
A sword said to have once belonged to a
hero from the sky. Its beautiful white blade
stands out. When it's wielded, a strange yet
heavenly breeze kicks up around you.
White Sword of the Sky.Caption (Japanese):
空から現れた勇者が手にしたといわれる剣
まっすぐに伸びた 美しい白い刃が特徴的
構えると 不思議と大空の風を感じる

Wooden Stick.Name: Wooden Stick
Wooden Stick.Caption:
A tree branch with an added grip and
excellent balance. Equip it, and use it as a
weapon.
Wooden Stick.Caption (Japanese):
樹木の枝を 持ちやすいように加工した棒で
振り回すのに 絶妙なバランスに仕上がっている
装備すれば 武器として使える

Sturdy Wooden Stick.Name: Sturdy Wooden Stick
Sturdy Wooden Stick.Caption:
A stick made out of a hard tree branch.
The tree soaked up lots of sunshine, so
it's sturdier than a regular stick and has
high durability.
Sturdy Wooden Stick.Caption (Japanese):
硬い樹木の枝を加工した棒
太陽の光をたっぷりと浴びた木の枝らしく
普通のものよりしっかりとしていて 耐久力が高い

Gnarled Wooden Stick.Name: Gnarled Wooden Stick
Gnarled Wooden Stick.Caption:
A very swingable stick made by honing a dried
branch to the proper thickness and length. Its
attack power is much greater than that of a
normal stick.
Gnarled Wooden Stick.Caption (Japanese):
乾いた枝を手ごろな大きさに加工した棒
太さと長さは振り回すのに申し分なく
普通の木の棒より 攻撃力がとても高い

Lizal Boomerang.Name: Lizal Boomerang
Lizal Boomerang.Caption:
A curved sword favored by the Lizalfos.
It's made of metal so it can safely be used
near fire. If you throw it, it will return to you.
Lizal Boomerang.Caption (Japanese):
リザルフォスが好んで使う 湾曲した剣
金属製のため 火気の多い場所でも安心して使える
投げると自分のところに戻ってくる特徴がある

Zonaite Sword.Name: Zonaite Sword
Zonaite Sword.Caption:
A Zonai sword made of zonaite. It resonates
with attached Zonai devices to slightly
increase its attack power.
Zonaite Sword.Caption (Japanese):
素材にゾナニウムを使った ゾナウ族の剣
先端にゾナウギアやゾナウ文明の素材を付けると
通常より攻撃力がわずかに上がる 特性を持つ

Strong Zonaite Sword.Name: Strong Zonaite Sword
Strong Zonaite Sword.Caption:
A strong Zonai sword made of zonaite.
It resonates with attached Zonai devices
to increase some of its attack power.
Strong Zonaite Sword.Caption (Japanese):
素材にゾナニウムを使った ゾナウ族の丈夫な剣
剣先のゾナウギアやゾナウ文明の素材に共鳴し
通常より攻撃力が上がる 特性を持つ

Mighty Zonaite Sword.Name: Mighty Zonaite Sword
Mighty Zonaite Sword.Caption:
A powerful sword used by Zonai and made of
zonaite. It resonates with attached Zonai
devices to greatly increase its attack power.
Mighty Zonaite Sword.Caption (Japanese):
ゾナニウムを素材とした ゾナウ族の強力な剣
ゾナウギアやゾナウ文明の素材を付けると
通常より攻撃力が大きく上がる 特性を持つ

Magic Rod.Name: Magic Rod
Magic Rod.Caption:
A small and intensely magic rod, it's said
to have been wielded by an ancient magician
who awoke maximum latent power in gems.
Magic Rod.Caption (Japanese):
不思議な魔力を感じる小さな杖
古代の魔術師はこの杖を用いる事で
宝石に眠る力を最大限に発揮できていたようだ

Bokoblin Arm.Name: Bokoblin Arm
Bokoblin Arm.Caption:
A skeletal arm that keeps moving even after
it’s severed from its body. It's kind of gross to
strap it to your back, but it'll do in a pinch.
It's old and fragile, so it's quick to break.
Bokoblin Arm.Caption (Japanese):
切り離されても動き続ける 不気味な腕の骨
あまりポーチに入れておきたくない
古びて もろくなっているのですぐ壊れる

Lizalfos Arm.Name: Lizalfos Arm
Lizalfos Arm.Caption:
The arm of a Stalizalfos that continues to
struggle even in death. It can be used as a
weapon, but it's very brittle. You can feel it
wiggling when you strap it to your back...
Lizalfos Arm.Caption (Japanese):
死してなお動き続ける スタルリザルフォスの骨
振り回せば武器として使えるが もろい
背負っている時も 動きが少し気になる…

Gloom Sword.Name: Gloom Sword
Gloom Sword.Caption:
This slender sword has an ominous presence.
It is said to end the life of anyone it touches.
Its gloom will gradually wear down the body of
its wielder.
Gloom Sword.Caption (Japanese):
禍々しい気配を放つ細身の剣
触れた者の生命を断ち切ると言われている
この剣を持つ者は 身体が少しずつ瘴気に蝕まれる

Farming Hoe.Name: Farming Hoe
Farming Hoe.Caption:
A farming tool primarily used for tilling fields.
Its fine craftsmanship is sturdy enough
to withstand backbreaking fieldwork, but
its battle applications are untested.
Farming Hoe.Caption (Japanese):
土を掘り起こし 畑をたがやすのに使われる農具
畑仕事に耐えられるような 丈夫な作りをしており
使いようによっては十分 武器になる

Boat Oar.Name: Boat Oar
Boat Oar.Caption:
Made for paddling boats, but it was made
sturdy enough to fight strong currents.
Maybe it's useful for self-defense in a pinch.
Boat Oar.Caption (Japanese):
漁船に備え付けられている道具
本来武器ではないが 護身用には十分使える
水に強い木材で作られており 結構丈夫

Giant Boomerang.Name: Giant Boomerang
Giant Boomerang.Caption:
A massive boomerang that is weathered and
decayed. It was originally used for hunting,
but it can be a challenge to wield. Thrown
well, it will come back to the thrower.
Giant Boomerang.Caption (Japanese):
朽ちてしまった巨大なブーメラン
元々は狩猟用だった物で 扱いが非常に難しい
うまく投げると 使用者の元に戻ってくる

Giant Boomerang\u2728.Name: Giant Boomerang✨
Giant Boomerang\u2728.Caption:
This massive boomerang requires two hands.
Originally used for hunting, it was modified
for use as a weapon. The blades on the
inner curves make it a bit tricky to wield.
Giant Boomerang\u2728.Caption (Japanese):
両手で振るう必要があるほど巨大なブーメラン
狩猟用だった物を戦闘用に改良しており
湾曲した内側に刃がある  扱いが非常に難しい

Traveler's Claymore.Name: Traveler's Claymore
Traveler's Claymore.Caption:
A basic two-handed sword once wielded by
aspiring adventurers. It's decayed and no
longer cuts well, but it can still knock a shield
right out of enemies' hands.
Traveler's Claymore.Caption (Japanese):
各地を旅する冒険者が愛用した汎用の両手剣
朽ちて斬れ味は良くないが
敵の構えた盾を吹き飛ばす事ができる

Traveler's Claymore\u2728.Name: Traveler's Claymore✨
Traveler's Claymore\u2728.Caption:
A basic two-handed sword once wielded by
aspiring adventurers. Its immense weight can
knock enemies' shields right out of their
hands.
Traveler's Claymore\u2728.Caption (Japanese):
各地を旅する冒険者が愛用した両手持ちの剣
魔物との戦いではその重さを生かし
敵の構えた盾を吹き飛ばす事ができる

Soldier's Claymore.Name: Soldier's Claymore
Soldier's Claymore.Caption:
A lightweight metal weapon forged for royal
soldiers. It's decayed now, but still easy to
wield, so it consumes less stamina during
charge attacks.
Soldier's Claymore.Caption (Japanese):
城の兵士用に 薄く軽量に仕上げた金属の両手剣
その軽さのため 振り回しても疲れにくく
タメ攻撃のがんばり消費を抑える事ができる

Soldier's Claymore\u2728.Name: Soldier's Claymore✨
Soldier's Claymore\u2728.Caption:
An improved claymore, made lightweight for
easier handling. It consumes less stamina for
charged attacks.
Soldier's Claymore\u2728.Caption (Japanese):
戦闘用に改良された両手剣
扱いやすいように軽量化されていて 
タメ攻撃のがんばり消費を抑える事ができる

Knight's Claymore.Name: Knight's Claymore
Knight's Claymore.Caption:
A claymore, now decayed, once carried by
knights of Hyrule. It resonates with the desire
to protect at all costs and can yield powerful
attacks when you're down to your last heart.
Knight's Claymore.Property 1: x2 Attack Power While Low Health
Knight's Claymore.Caption (Japanese):
城を守る騎士が携えていた両手剣 大切なものを
守る想いに呼応し ハートの残りが1個まで減ると
強力な攻撃を繰り出せる

Knight's Claymore\u2728.Name: Knight's Claymore✨
Knight's Claymore\u2728.Caption:
Only the strongest of Hyrule Castle's knights
carried this two-handed sword. It can yield
powerful attacks when you're down to your
last heart.
Knight's Claymore\u2728.Property 1: x2 Attack Power While Low Health
Knight's Claymore\u2728.Caption (Japanese):
ハイラル城を守る騎士の中でも 十分な力量を
持つ者が携えていた大剣 ハートが1個以下の時に
強力な攻撃を繰り出す事ができる

Royal Claymore.Name: Royal Claymore
Royal Claymore.Caption:
A large sword, now decayed, issued to the
royal family's guard. It's tuned for skilled
users and yields a powerful flurry rush during
a perfect dodge.
Royal Claymore.Property 1: x2 Attack Power During Flurry Rush
Royal Claymore.Caption (Japanese):
王家直属部隊が賜った大剣 扱う難度は高いが
熟練の使い手に向けて調整されており
回避ジャスト時のラッシュ攻撃が強力

Royal Claymore\u2728.Name: Royal Claymore✨
Royal Claymore\u2728.Caption:
A two-handed sword issued to the Hyrulean
royal family's immediate guard detail. Yields a
powerful strike and increases the power of
flurry rush during perfect dodge.
Royal Claymore\u2728.Property 1: x2 Attack Power During Flurry Rush
Royal Claymore\u2728.Caption (Japanese):
ハイラル王家の直属部隊に与えられた大剣
その一振りの威力は大きく 回避ジャスト時の
ラッシュ攻撃が強力になる 特性を持つ

Zora Longsword.Name: Zora Longsword
Zora Longsword.Caption:
A decayed Zora longsword, it's suited for
battles near water because it's made of an
unusual metal that increases attack power
when it's wet.
Zora Longsword.Caption (Japanese):
刀身が朽ちてしまったゾーラ族の大剣
濡れた状態で高い攻撃力を発揮する 特殊な
金属が使われていて 水辺での戦いに適している

Zora Longsword\u2728.Name: Zora Longsword✨
Zora Longsword\u2728.Caption:
A longsword made by the Zora using a special
metal. It's rarely used because the Zora
prefer to use spears. It yields high attack
power when it gets wet.
Zora Longsword\u2728.Caption (Japanese):
特殊な金属を用いてゾーラ族が作った大剣
ゾーラは槍を好むため あまり使う者がいないが
水に濡れると高い攻撃力を発揮する

Cobble Crusher.Name: Cobble Crusher
Cobble Crusher.Caption:
In its former state, this hefty weapon knocked
out many a foe. Decayed, it still packs a
punch and is great for breaking rocks.
Cobble Crusher.Property 1: x1.5 Attack Power On Rock Type
Cobble Crusher.Caption (Japanese):
元々 その重量を活かして相手を打撃で
倒すのを主としていた武器 朽ちてはいるが
岩を砕き 採掘するのに最適である

Cobble Crusher\u2728.Name: Cobble Crusher✨
Cobble Crusher\u2728.Caption:
A Goron-made two-handed weapon. It's
made from thick, hard metal and has no
cutting edge, but its weight and hard surface
make it a great tool for breaking rocks.
Cobble Crusher\u2728.Property 1: x1.5 Attack Power On Rock Type
Cobble Crusher\u2728.Caption (Japanese):
分厚く硬い金属で作られたゴロンの両手剣
刃は付いておらず 斬れ味は全くないが 
その硬度と重量は 採掘するのに最適である

Boulder Breaker.Name: Boulder Breaker
Boulder Breaker.Caption:
This two-handed weapon was once wielded
by the Goron Champion Daruk. Daruk made
swinging it around look easy, but a Hylian
would need an immense amount of strength.
Boulder Breaker.Property 1: x1.5 Attack Power On Rock Type
Boulder Breaker.Caption (Japanese):
英傑ダルケルが携えていた 最硬級の大剣
ダルケルはこの大剣を軽々と振るっていたが
人間が使いこなすには かなりの熟練が必要

Biggoron's Sword.Name: Biggoron's Sword
Biggoron's Sword.Caption:
A legendary greatsword forged by a Goron
craftsman for a hero who traveled through
time. The exceptionally sharp cutting edge
is a testament to the craftsman's mastery.
Biggoron's Sword.Caption (Japanese):
ゴロンの名匠が 時を超えて旅をした勇者のために
作ったと言われる 伝説的な剛剣
匠の業が光る抜群の切れ味を持つ

Gerudo Claymore.Name: Gerudo Claymore
Gerudo Claymore.Caption:
A two-handed Gerudo sword with a decayed
blade. Attaching a material greatly enhances
the material's power but doesn't add as much
durability.
Gerudo Claymore.Caption (Japanese):
刀身が朽ちてしまったゲルド族の大剣
剣先に力を込めやすいため 剣の耐久力を犠牲に
付けた素材の力を限界まで引き出す事ができる

Gerudo Claymore\u2728.Name: Gerudo Claymore✨
Gerudo Claymore\u2728.Caption:
Only the most talented Gerudo sword fighters
carry this two-handed sword. Attaching a
material greatly enhances the material's
power but doesn't add as much durability.
Gerudo Claymore\u2728.Caption (Japanese):
ゲルド族の中の 剣術に優れた者が装備した大剣
先端に素材を付けると 剣が壊れやすくなる代わり
その力を限界まで引き出す 特性を持つ

Eightfold Longblade.Name: Eightfold Longblade
Eightfold Longblade.Caption:
A longblade that no longer cuts as well as it
once did, due to its decayed edge. However,
when wielded by a proficient fighter, it cleaves
the wind and creates a vacuum.
Eightfold Longblade.Caption (Japanese):
刀身が朽ちてしまった片刃の大剣
朽ちて斬れ味は落ちてしまっているが
精神統一して振り抜くと 真空の刃が放てる

Eightfold Longblade\u2728.Name: Eightfold Longblade✨
Eightfold Longblade\u2728.Caption:
A single-edged sword seldom seen in Hyrule.
This weapon is passed down through the
Sheikah tribe. When wielded by a proficient
fighter, it cleaves wind and creates vacuum.
Eightfold Longblade\u2728.Caption (Japanese):
シーカー族にのみ伝わる片刃の剣
伝統的な技術で丁寧に鍛えられており
精神統一して振りぬくと 真空の刃が放てる

Dusk Claymore.Name: Dusk Claymore
Dusk Claymore.Caption:
A slender claymore thought to have been
handed down to the kingdom of Hyrule ages
ago. The blade shines with a holy luster.
Dusk Claymore.Caption (Japanese):
はるか遠い昔 ハイラル王国に
伝わったとされる 細身の大剣
その刀身は 神秘的な白い輝きを放っている

Fierce Deity Sword.Name: Fierce Deity Sword
Fierce Deity Sword.Caption:
A peculiar greatsword allegedly used by a
hero from a world in which the moon
threatened to fall. It slashes wildly in battle
as if possessed by a Fierce Deity.
Fierce Deity Sword.Caption (Japanese):
月が落ちてくる世界の勇者が所持していたと
言われている異形の大剣  これを手にした者は
まさに鬼神のごとき戦いぶりを見せるという

Rusty Claymore.Name: Rusty Claymore
Rusty Claymore.Caption:
A two-handed sword not properly cared for.
Although it can be used as a weapon, its
durability is very low. Don't expect it to
last for more than a few strikes.
Rusty Claymore.Caption (Japanese):
長く放置されて 錆びついてしまった大剣
武器として使う事はできるが 耐久性は低く
何度か使うと簡単に壊れてしまう

Royal Guard's Claymore.Name: Royal Guard's Claymore
Royal Guard's Claymore.Caption:
A decayed claymore prototype for the royal
guard. It's made of a metal refined using an
unusual method, and it holds massive
destructive power just before it breaks.
Royal Guard's Claymore.Property 1: x2 Attack Power While Low Durability
Royal Guard's Claymore.Caption (Japanese):
近衛騎士のために試作された両手剣 特殊な技術で
鍛えた金属を用いており 耐久性が低いが
壊れそうになると 大きな攻撃力を発揮する

Royal Guard's Claymore\u2728.Name: Royal Guard's Claymore✨
Royal Guard's Claymore\u2728.Caption:
The Sheikah used the very essence of ancient
technology to forge this greatsword. It's low
in durability, but its magic yields massive
destructive power just before it breaks.
Royal Guard's Claymore\u2728.Property 1: x2 Attack Power While Low Durability
Royal Guard's Claymore\u2728.Caption (Japanese):
シーカー族が古代技術の粋を集めて作った大剣
耐久性に難があるが 壊れそうになると
大きな攻撃力を発揮する 特性を持つ

Thick Stick.Name: Thick Stick
Thick Stick.Caption:
A stick cut off from a large tree. It isn't very
sturdy, but its heavier end can swat a
shield away.
Thick Stick.Caption (Japanese):
大きな木から切り落とした棒
それほど頑丈さはないが 先端が重いので
振り回せば 盾を弾き飛ばす事ができる

Sturdy Thick Stick.Name: Sturdy Thick Stick
Sturdy Thick Stick.Caption:
A solid stick cut from the crooked branch of
a tough tree. It has high durability, despite the
way it looks.
Sturdy Thick Stick.Caption (Japanese):
丈夫な木から切り落とした硬い棒
いびつな形に太く成長した枝は
その見た目に反し 耐久力が高い

Gnarled Thick Stick.Name: Gnarled Thick Stick
Gnarled Thick Stick.Caption:
A stick cut from a tree trunk. It's been dried to
increase its hardness. It has high attack
power for something made of wood.
Gnarled Thick Stick.Caption (Japanese):
樹木の幹に近い部分から切り出した棒
乾燥する事で硬度が増し
木製とは思えないほど 攻撃力が高い

Zonaite Longsword.Name: Zonaite Longsword
Zonaite Longsword.Caption:
A large sword used by the Zonai and made of
zonaite. It resonates with attached Zonai
devices to slightly increase its attack power.
Zonaite Longsword.Caption (Japanese):
素材にゾナニウムを使った ゾナウ族の大きな剣
ゾナウギアやゾナウ文明の素材を付けると
通常より攻撃力がわずかに上がる 特性を持つ

Strong Zonaite Longsword.Name: Strong Zonaite Longsword
Strong Zonaite Longsword.Caption:
A strong, large sword used by the Zonai and
made of zonaite. It resonates with attached
Zonai devices to increase some of its attack
power.
Strong Zonaite Longsword.Caption (Japanese):
ゾナニウムから作られた ゾナウ族の丈夫な大剣
ゾナウギアやゾナウ文明の素材に共鳴し
通常より攻撃力が上がる 特性を持つ

Mighty Zonaite Longsword.Name: Mighty Zonaite Longsword
Mighty Zonaite Longsword.Caption:
A powerful, large sword used by Zonai and
made of zonaite. It resonates with attached
Zonai devices to greatly increase its attack
power.
Mighty Zonaite Longsword.Caption (Japanese):
ゾナニウムを素材とした ゾナウ族の強力な大剣
ゾナウギアやゾナウ文明の素材に共鳴し
通常より攻撃力が大きく上がる 特性を持つ

Magic Scepter.Name: Magic Scepter
Magic Scepter.Caption:
A long and mysterious magical rod, it's said
to have been wielded by an ancient magician
who awoke the latent power of gems.
Magic Scepter.Caption (Japanese):
わずかに不思議な力を帯びた大きい杖
古代の魔術師はこの杖によって
宝石に眠った力を呼び覚ましていたと言われる

Moblin Arm.Name: Moblin Arm
Moblin Arm.Caption:
A Moblin bone that continues to move even
after being detached from its body. The bone
is thick enough to be used as a weapon but
is extremely brittle and easily broken.
Moblin Arm.Caption (Japanese):
腕だけになっても動き続けている モリブリンの骨
長くて太い骨は 武器として使うに十分な
打撃力を持つが 非常にもろく壊れやすい

Gloom Club.Name: Gloom Club
Gloom Club.Caption:
A metal stick filled with madness and symbolic
of doom. Its forceful strike can smash an
object to pieces. Its gloom will gradually wear
down the body of its wielder.
Gloom Club.Property 2: x1.5 Attack Power On Rock Type
Gloom Club.Caption (Japanese):
狂気に満ちた 不吉を象徴する金棒
その強力な一撃は 対象を跡形もなく粉砕する
この金棒を持つ者は 身体が徐々に瘴気に蝕まれる

Wooden Mop.Name: Wooden Mop
Wooden Mop.Caption:
Just a mop to the untrained eye, it excels at
tidying up the place. But it owes its sturdy
construction to a true craftsman, so it
actually has some combat merit.
Wooden Mop.Caption (Japanese):
床の清掃に大活躍する掃除道具
職人による手作りのため 丈夫にできている 
武器にしても ある程度使える

Farmer's Pitchfork.Name: Farmer's Pitchfork
Farmer's Pitchfork.Caption:
A farming tool used to collect hay efficiently.
It's light enough to be used by anyone.
The four prongs are very sharp.
Farmer's Pitchfork.Caption (Japanese):
干し草を効率よく集めるための農具
誰でも扱えるように軽く作られている
4つに分かれた先端は結構鋭い

Fishing Harpoon.Name: Fishing Harpoon
Fishing Harpoon.Caption:
A fisherman's tool that excels at catching
large fish. Its particularly sharp spearhead
makes it valuable as a weapon as well.
Fishing Harpoon.Caption (Japanese):
主に大型の魚を獲るために使う漁具
鋭く尖った先端を持ち 武器としても使える
逃げる魚をこれで仕留められれば 一人前の漁師

Throwing Spear.Name: Throwing Spear
Throwing Spear.Caption:
A spear for throwing with a decayed tip. Lost
its sharpness, but kept the balance perfect for
throwing, enabling you to throw it very far.
Throwing Spear.Caption (Japanese):
刃先が朽ちてしまった 投てき用の槍
鋭さは失われているが 投げるのに最適な重心や
バランスはそのままで 遠くに投げる事ができる

Throwing Spear\u2728.Name: Throwing Spear✨
Throwing Spear\u2728.Caption:
A specialized spear weighted to excel as a
throwing weapon. It's perfectly balanced
to be thrown farther than your average spear,
able to pierce targets from a great distance.
Throwing Spear\u2728.Caption (Japanese):
投げて突き刺す事に特化した特殊な槍
穂先と柄のバランスを取る事で 通常の槍より
遠くまで投げられるように設計されている

Traveler's Spear.Name: Traveler's Spear
Traveler's Spear.Caption:
An average spear carried by travelers for
protection. It's decayed and doesn't cut
well, but the shape makes it easy for anyone
to handle.
Traveler's Spear.Caption (Japanese):
旅人が護身用に持ち歩いた 一般的な槍
朽ちてしまって斬れ味は良くないが
誰にでも扱いやすい形状をしている

Traveler's Spear\u2728.Name: Traveler's Spear✨
Traveler's Spear\u2728.Caption:
A spear used mainly by travelers to fend off
wolves and other beasts. It's easy to hold
and simple to use.
Traveler's Spear\u2728.Caption (Japanese):
旅人がオオカミなどの野生動物から
身を守るために持ち歩いていた 護身用の槍
握りやすく使い心地がよい

Soldier's Spear.Name: Soldier's Spear
Soldier's Spear.Caption:
Although now decayed, this lightweight metal
spear was made for royal soldiers. Because
it's light and easy to handle, it enables
quicker charged attacks.
Soldier's Spear.Caption (Japanese):
城の兵士用に軽量化された金属の槍
軽く扱いやすいため
タメ攻撃を素早く繰り出せる

Soldier's Spear\u2728.Name: Soldier's Spear✨
Soldier's Spear\u2728.Caption:
A long spear once used by the guards of
Hyrule Castle. Easy to use but difficult to
master. Enables quicker charged attacks.
Soldier's Spear\u2728.Caption (Japanese):
城の兵士が使っていた長槍 十分な鍛錬を積んだ
者が扱えば 思い通りに振り回す事ができ
タメ攻撃を素早く繰り出す事ができる

Knight's Halberd.Name: Knight's Halberd
Knight's Halberd.Caption:
Now decayed, this halberd was made for
knights of Hyrule. It reflects their courage in
defending the kingdom. It can yield powerful
attacks when you're down to your last heart.
Knight's Halberd.Property 1: x2 Attack Power While Low Health
Knight's Halberd.Caption (Japanese):
城の騎士用に作られた槍 王国と城を守る
騎士道の精神により ハートが残り1個以下の時
強力な攻撃を繰り出せる

Knight's Halberd\u2728.Name: Knight's Halberd✨
Knight's Halberd\u2728.Caption:
A spear used by knights adept in mounted
combat. The spearhead is modeled after
an axe. It can yield powerful attacks when
you're down to your last heart.
Knight's Halberd\u2728.Property 1: x2 Attack Power While Low Health
Knight's Halberd\u2728.Caption (Japanese):
武器に熟練した騎士のために作られた槍
斧状の槍頭が特徴的で ハートが残り1個以下の時
強力な攻撃を繰り出す事ができる

Royal Halberd.Name: Royal Halberd
Royal Halberd.Caption:
Although now decayed, this spear was once
given to knights who guarded critical areas of
Hyrule Castle. It enables a powerful flurry rush
during a perfect dodge.
Royal Halberd.Property 1: x2 Attack Power During Flurry Rush
Royal Halberd.Caption (Japanese):
城の重要な場所を守る騎士に 与えられた槍
使いこなすには並以上の技量が必要だが
回避ジャスト時のラッシュ攻撃が強力になる

Royal Halberd\u2728.Name: Royal Halberd✨
Royal Halberd\u2728.Caption:
This spear was issued to the knights who
guarded Hyrule Castle's throne room. It yields
a powerful flurry rush during a perfect dodge.
Royal Halberd\u2728.Property 1: x2 Attack Power During Flurry Rush
Royal Halberd\u2728.Caption (Japanese):
城の中でも特に重要な場所を守る任務に
就いていた騎士に与えられた槍 回避ジャスト時の
ラッシュ攻撃が強力になる 特性を持つ

Forest Dweller's Spear.Name: Forest Dweller's Spear
Forest Dweller's Spear.Caption:
A Korok spear with a decayed tip. It's still
full of vitality. Bursting materials attached
to the spearhead can be reused again
and again.
Forest Dweller's Spear.Caption (Japanese):
穂先が朽ちてしまったコログ族の槍
生命力に満ち溢れており 先端に破裂する実を
付けると その特性を繰り返し使う事ができる

Forest Dweller's Spear\u2728.Name: Forest Dweller's Spear✨
Forest Dweller's Spear\u2728.Caption:
The Koroks made this spear for Hylians.
The shaft is made from a light, sturdy wood.
Bursting materials attached to the spearhead
can be reused again and again.
Forest Dweller's Spear\u2728.Caption (Japanese):
コログ族が人間のために作ったといわれる槍
軽くて丈夫な木が材料で 穂先に破裂する実を
付けると その特性を何度も使う事ができる

Zora Spear.Name: Zora Spear
Zora Spear.Caption:
A Zora spear with a decayed point. It's made
of a water-resistant metal and yields a high
attack power when it gets wet.
Zora Spear.Caption (Japanese):
刀身が朽ちてしまったゾーラ族の槍
水に強い特殊な金属を用いており
濡れると高い攻撃力を発揮する

Zora Spear\u2728.Name: Zora Spear✨
Zora Spear\u2728.Caption:
This spear is a Zora's weapon of choice. It's
made from a special metal and is used by the
Zora for both fishing and protecting home. It
yields high attack power when it gets wet.
Zora Spear\u2728.Caption (Japanese):
ゾーラ族に広く一般的に使われていた槍
漁だけでなく 外敵から里を守る戦いにも使われた
水に濡れると高い攻撃力を発揮する

Lightscale Trident.Name: Lightscale Trident
Lightscale Trident.Caption:
A spear of peerless grace cherished by the
Zora Champion Mipha. Although Mipha
specialized in healing abilities, her
spearmanship was in a class all its own.
Lightscale Trident.Caption (Japanese):
英傑ミファーが愛用していた優美な名槍
治癒を得意とするミファーだったが 
槍の扱いも一流であったと言われている

Feathered Spear.Name: Feathered Spear
Feathered Spear.Caption:
A spear used by Rito soldiers, its point is now
decayed. It still boasts quick attacks in midair,
and it produces a strong wind.
Feathered Spear.Caption (Japanese):
刀身が朽ちてしまったリト族兵士の槍
穂先が特徴的な形状をしており 素早く突く事で
大きな風を生み出す事ができる

Feathered Spear\u2728.Name: Feathered Spear✨
Feathered Spear\u2728.Caption:
Its lightweight design is a hallmark of Rito
craftsmanship. It gives Rito warriors more
maneuverability during aerial combat—and it
produces a strong wind.
Feathered Spear\u2728.Caption (Japanese):
リト族の兵士が使う槍 空で羽ばたきながら
使う事ができ 突きを繰り出すたびに
大きな風を生み出す 特性を持つ

Gerudo Spear.Name: Gerudo Spear
Gerudo Spear.Caption:
A Gerudo spear with a decayed blade that is
designed to draw force to its tip. Attaching a
material greatly enhances the material's
power but doesn't add as much durability.
Gerudo Spear.Caption (Japanese):
刀身が朽ちてしまったゲルド族の槍
先端に力が集中しやすく 槍への負荷は大きいが
穂先の素材の力を限界まで引き出す事ができる

Gerudo Spear\u2728.Name: Gerudo Spear✨
Gerudo Spear\u2728.Caption:
This spear was used widely by the Gerudo
soldiers. Attaching a material greatly
enhances the material's power but doesn't
add as much durability.
Gerudo Spear\u2728.Caption (Japanese):
ゲルド族の兵士に 広く用いられていた槍
穂先に素材を付けると 槍に大きな負荷を与える
代わり その力を限界まで引き出す 特性を持つ

Rusty Halberd.Name: Rusty Halberd
Rusty Halberd.Caption:
A rusty polearm likely used by knights from
an age past. The spearhead is in bad shape
due to prolonged exposure to the elements,
so its durability is low.
Rusty Halberd.Caption (Japanese):
大昔に騎士が使っていたと思われる 錆びついた槍
長く風雨に晒されたせいか 槍頭の痛みが激しく
耐久性は低い

Royal Guard's Spear.Name: Royal Guard's Spear
Royal Guard's Spear.Caption:
A prototype spear wielded by knights. It's
made from a special metal with low durability,
but which yields massive destructive power
just before it breaks.
Royal Guard's Spear.Property 1: x2 Attack Power While Low Durability
Royal Guard's Spear.Caption (Japanese):
近衛騎士が使った試作品の槍 特殊な金属製のため
耐久力が低く扱いが難しいが 壊れそうになると
大きな攻撃力を発揮する 特性を持つ

Royal Guard's Spear\u2728.Name: Royal Guard's Spear✨
Royal Guard's Spear\u2728.Caption:
This Sheikah-made spear was created using
ancient technology. It has poor durability, but
the magic it contains yields massive
destructive power just before it breaks.
Royal Guard's Spear\u2728.Property 1: x2 Attack Power While Low Durability
Royal Guard's Spear\u2728.Caption (Japanese):
シーカー族が古代技術を活かして作った槍
耐久性は低いが 壊れそうになると
大きな攻撃力を発揮する 特性を持つ

Long Stick.Name: Long Stick
Long Stick.Caption:
A long stick fashioned from a tree branch.
Its straight shape makes it work well as a
lunging weapon.
Long Stick.Caption (Japanese):
樹木の枝を切り落とした長い棒
真っすぐな形状を生かして
突き刺す武器として使える

Sturdy Long Stick.Name: Sturdy Long Stick
Sturdy Long Stick.Caption:
A long, durable stick made from a branch with
good piercing power. It has high durability
because it comes from the hardest part of
the tree.
Sturdy Long Stick.Caption (Japanese):
長く伸びた丈夫な棒 歪みが少ないその枝は
突き刺す力を伝えやすく 樹木の硬い部分を選んで
切り出しているため 耐久力が高い

Gnarled Long Stick.Name: Gnarled Long Stick
Gnarled Long Stick.Caption:
A long stick made bumpy at one end when its
shoots were cut off. It has higher attack
power than a normal stick.
Gnarled Long Stick.Caption (Japanese):
枝分かれした先端を切り落とした長棒
切断面がデコボコしていて 当たると痛いため
普通の棒より 攻撃力が高い

Zonaite Spear.Name: Zonaite Spear
Zonaite Spear.Caption:
A Zonai spear made of zonaite. It resonates
with attached Zonai devices to slightly
increase its attack power.
Zonaite Spear.Caption (Japanese):
ゾナニウムを素材とした ゾナウ族の槍
穂先にゾナウギアやゾナウ文明の素材を付けると
通常より攻撃力がわずかに上がる 特性を持つ

Strong Zonaite Spear.Name: Strong Zonaite Spear
Strong Zonaite Spear.Caption:
A tough spear used by the Zonai. It is highly
durable. It resonates with attached Zonai
devices to increase some of its attack power.
Strong Zonaite Spear.Caption (Japanese):
ゾナウ族が使っていた丈夫な槍 耐久力に優れ
ゾナウギアやゾナウ文明の素材を付けると 
通常より攻撃力が上がる 特性を持つ

Mighty Zonaite Spear.Name: Mighty Zonaite Spear
Mighty Zonaite Spear.Caption:
A powerful Zonai spear made of zonaite.
It resonates with attached Zonai devices
to greatly increase its attack power.
Mighty Zonaite Spear.Caption (Japanese):
ゾナニウムを素材とした ゾナウ族の強力な槍
穂先のゾナウギアやゾナウ文明の素材に共鳴し
通常より攻撃力が大きく上がる 特性を持つ

Magic Staff.Name: Magic Staff
Magic Staff.Caption:
A long rod with a bit of magic, it's said to
have been wielded by an ancient magician
who awoke the latent power of gems.
Magic Staff.Caption (Japanese):
ほのかに魔力を帯びた長い杖
古代の魔術師が宝石の力を引き出すための
祭具として利用していたと言われる

Gloom Spear.Name: Gloom Spear
Gloom Spear.Caption:
A spear whose ominous appearance strikes
fear into hearts. It is said to cost its bearer a
part of their soul because its gloom will
gradually wear down the body of its wielder.
Gloom Spear.Caption (Japanese):
見ているだけで身がすくむ 恐ろしい雰囲気の槍
一薙ぎで魂を刈り取るとも言われており
この槍を持つ者は 徐々に身体が瘴気に蝕まれる

Decayed Master Sword.Name: Decayed Master Sword
Decayed Master Sword.Caption:
The sword that seals the darkness. Its sacred
power has been diminished after being
ravaged by the gloom beneath Hyrule Castle.
Decayed Master Sword.Name (Japanese): 朽ちたマスターソード
Decayed Master Sword.Caption (Japanese):
聖なる力が宿る 退魔の剣
今は ハイラル城の地下で受けた瘴気で
刀身が朽ちてしまっている
